verses.content: Chun Levi sûnghai laia mi pakhat chu a feh a, Levi naunu nuhmeiin a nei tah a.
Nuhmei chu ân rai a, naupasal a hung nei a; naupang hmêl ṭhatak a nih ti a hmuin thla thum a thup- hmang a.
Chun, ama chu a thuphmang zing thei naw phingleh phairuong lawng a lâk a, fâr hnai le lawng hnaiin a zût a; chu sûnga chun nau- pang chu a sieh a, vadung sîra phairuonghai lai chun a sie tah a.
Ama chu iengtin am a um pei ti hre dingin a farnu chu hla fea hin a ngir a.
Chun Pharao naunu chu va- dunga insil dingin a hung thlah a; a nunghâkhai chu vadung pang hrûla chun an fe vêl a; phairuong- hai laia lawng chu a hmu tah a, nunghâk pakhat chu va la dingin a tir a.
A hang hawng chun nautê chu a hmuh a: chun, ngai ta, nautê chu a ṭap tah a. Ama chu a lunginsiet a, “Hi hi Hebrai nauhai laia pakhat chu a ni ngei el,” a tih a.
Chun a farnu chun Pharao naunu kuomah, “Fêng ka ta, Hebrai nuhmei naudawntu, hi nautê dawnpêktu ding che hi ka va kopêk ding che am a nih?” a tih a.
Pharao naunu chun a kuomah, “Va fe rawh,” a tih a. Chun nunghâk chu a feh a, naupang nu ngei chu a va ko tah a.
Chun, Pharao naunu chun a kuomah, “Hi naupang hi la la; ka ta dingin dawn rawh; chun, i hlaw tâwk pêng ka ti che,” a tih a.

Chun, nuhmei chun naupang chu a lâk a, a dawn tah a. Naupang chu a hung inṭhang lien a, Pharao naunu kuomah a hung ṭhuoi a, a naupa a hung ni tah a. Chun, “Tuia inthawka ka lâk suok a nih a” tiin a hmingah Mosie a sak a.
Mosie chu a hung puitling a, ni khat chu a unauhai kuomah a fe tah a; an rikphurhai chu a hmuh a: chun, a unauhai laia mi pakhat, Hebrai mi, Aigupta miin a vuok a hmuh a.
Chun, a ngha vêl a ngha vêl a, mi tukhawm an um nawh ti a hmu phingin Aigupta mi chu a vuok hlum a, phaiphinah a thuphmang tah a.
A ni hninaa a va fe suok nâwk chun, ngai ta, Hebrai mi pahni an lo insuol a; ama chun a thil suksuoltu lem kuoma chun, “Iengdinga i unau i vuok am a na?” a tih a.

Ama chun a kuomah, “Kan chungah lal le rorêltuin tuin am a siem cheh a? Aigupta mi i that ang khan kei khawm hi mi that i tum a ni maw?” a tih a. Chun, Mosie chu a ṭi tah a, “Hi thil hi hriet suokin a um chie tah a ni hi,” a tih a.

Pharao chun chu thil chu a hriet phingleh, Mosie chu sukhlum dingin a zawng tah a. Nisienlakhawm, Mosie chu Pharao hmaa inthawk a tlân hmang a, Midian ramah a um ta zing a; chun, tuisunsuo sîrah a ṭhung tah a.
Midian mihai thiempu chun naunuhmei pasari a nei a; anni chu an hung a, tui an chawi a, an pa berâm ruol chu tui pe dingin tuibêlhai chu an thâl sip a.
Chun, berâmpuhai chu an hung a, anni chu an hnawt hmang tah a; nisienlakhawm, Mosie chu a ngîr a, anni a ṭhangpui a, an berâm ruol chu tui ân dâwntir tah a.
An pa Reuel kuomah an hung chun, “Iengtizie am a na vawisûn chu in va hung inhma de?” a lo tih a.
Anni chun, “Aigupta mi pakhat- in berâmpuhai kuta inthawk a mi sansuok tâwl a nih, chu bak khawm chu ni loin tui a mi chawipêk a, kan berâm ruol tui ân dâwntir bawk a,” an tih a.
Ama chun a naunuhai kuomah, “Anleh ama chu khâwlai am a um a? chu mipa chu iengdinga in hung mâksan am? Bei fa dingin ama chu hung ko ro,” a tih a.
Chun, Mosie chu chu mipa kuoma um ding chun ân sukthlûk tah a; ama chun a naunu Zippora chu Mosie a pêk a.
Zippora chun naupasal a nei a. Mosie chun, “Hrietlo rama inzin ka ni tah a,” a tih a, a hmingah Gersom a sak tah a.
Chuong ni tamtak sûng chun Aigupta lal chu a thi tah a. Israel thlahai chu an intângna lei chun an thuok a dawng hleh a, Pathien an ko a, an intângna leia ama an kona chun Pathien kuom a tlung tah a.
Pathienin an inrûm chu a hriet a, Abraham, Isak le Jakob kuoma a thuthlung chu Pathienin a hriet zing a.
Chun, Israel thlahai chu Pathien chun a hmuh a, anni chu a hriet zing bawk a.
